amendment.description: Amendment requires the Director to consider unemployment rates when awarding grants.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in Part B of House Report 111-340 to require the Director to consider unemployment rates when awarding grants.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cardoza amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cardoza amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Cardoza.
